mapper.select: select d_No from Device where u_No = #{u_No} and SerialNo = #{SerialNo};
mapper.update: update User set u_Last = #{d_No} where u_No = #{u_No};
update Device set d_Name = #{d_Name}, d_Age = #{d_Age}, d_Species = #{d_Species}, d_Weight = #{d_Weight} where d_No = #{d_No};
update User u set u.u_Last = (select min(d.d_No) from Device d where d.u_No = #{u_No}) where u.u_No = #{u_No};
update User set u_Last = 0 where u_No = #{u_No};
